title: AVA: Futuristic JavaScript test runner
description: AVA is a futuristic JavaScript runner. It's designed to make testing easier and perhaps even fun. Let's talk about its design philosophy, some of it's powerful features and what's next. --- I'm Mark, member of the AVA core team. I try and spend my time doing Node/JavaScript contracting and open source work.
name: Mark Wubben
